items.content_html: This repository contains a lightweight REST API built with Express.js, MongoDB, and Node.js for managing product data. It supports basic CRUD operations and is hosted on Render for easy access. Use it to quickly set up a backend for your projects requiring product management functionality.
items.title: Hariharanm95/Rest-API: This repository contains a lightweight REST API built with Express.js, MongoDB, and Node.js for managing product data. It supports basic CRUD operations and is hosted on Render for easy access. Use it to quickly set up a backend for your projects requiring product management functionality.

items.content_html: noUiSlider is a lightweight, ARIA-accessible JavaScript range slider with multi-touch and keyboard support. It is fully GPU animated: no reflows, so it is fast; even on older devices. It also fits wonderfully in responsive designs and has no dependencies.
items.title: leongersen/noUiSlider: noUiSlider is a lightweight, ARIA-accessible JavaScript range slider with multi-touch and keyboard support. It is fully GPU animated: no reflows, so it is fast; even on older devices. It also fits wonderfully in responsive designs and has no dependencies.
